vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32404, previously approved on March 8, 2023, which abandoned a portion of an alley to 739 Fort Worth Avenue, LLC, located near the intersection of Fort Worth and Sylvan Avenues; by altering Section 10(c) to extend the required timeframe for design and construction of the dedicated alley from one and a half years to two years - Revenue: General Fund $7,800.00, plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
vote.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32404, previously approved on March 8, 2023, which abandoned a portion of an alley to 739 Fort Worth Avenue, LLC, located near the intersection of Fort Worth and Sylvan Avenues; by altering Section 10(c) to extend the required timeframe for design and construction of the dedicated alley from one and a half years to two years - Revenue: General Fund $7,800.00, plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
